news.title: High cost of goods is causing consumers to spend less for the holidays, CNBC survey finds
news.summary: CNBC All-America Economic Survey found the "high cost of goods" has emerged as a major factor affecting how much shoppers spend and where they spend.

news.title: FDA approved a $250,000 Singapore work trip during government shutdown, records show
news.summary: The FDA sent 31 staffers to a Singapore conference during the shutdown, records show. The move raises questions of optics, spending and the agency's strained resources.

news.title: Ukraine gives up joining NATO in bid to shift the dial in Russia peace talks
news.summary: Russia's opposition made NATO membership unlikely for Ukraine, but it's a major policy shift to publicly abandon the goal. Russia's opposition has said NATO membership is unlikely but not impossible.

news.title: Goldman Sachs makes big bet on ETFs specializing in downside protection
news.summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management is making a big bet on defined outcome exchange-traded funds. The funds use options to help protect against market losses.

news.title: Trump says Kevin Warsh is at top of Fed chair candidate list, president should be consulted on rates
news.summary: Trump says Kevin Warsh has moved to the top of his list as the next Federal Reserve chair. Others remain in contention for the job.

news.title: Gen X-ers are lagging behind in  retirement saving and planning. Here’s how to catch up.
news.summary: A majority of Gen X-ers didn’t prioritize retirement until age 50 or older. A majority of Generation Z-ers don��’s priority retirement is at age 50.

news.title: AI is crushing these once-reliable tech stocks. Are investors missing the point?
news.summary: FactSet and Gartner are among the S&P 500’s worst performers this year. Some on Wall Street see resilient and sticky businesses that can adapt to AI.

news.title: Why gold and bitcoin are uninvestible to this Wall Street legend
news.summary: Howard Marks has been writing investment memos for 35 years. The one thing you’ll never read is him making the case for gold or bitcoin.

news.title: The AI boom will turn to bust in 2026, says this forecaster who offers his trade of the year
news.summary: High valuations leave stocks vulnerable to a big tech sell-off, according to BCA Research. BCA says tech stocks could be vulnerable to big sell-offs in the near future.

news.title: The deadline to enroll in Obamacare is Monday if you want coverage to start Jan. 1
news.summary: The subsidies that made Affordable Care Act plans more affordable are expiring. The marketplace coverage in 2026 will be much more expensive, experts say.
